Item.method_code: Dim callframe As Item = Me.newitem("SQL","SQL PROCESS") callframe.setproperty("name","select_project_tree") callframe.setproperty("PROCESS","CALL") callframe.setproperty("ARG1", Me.getID()) Dim resultframe As Item = callframe.apply() If resultframe.isError() Then cco.startup.debuglog("select_project_tree failed",resultframe.dom) End If Return resultframe
Item.name: select_project_tree
